Share: Digg Facebook StumbleUpon An Extraordinary Photograph in A Dutch Home © 2004 by Linda Moulton Howe The fifth in a series of photographs taken by 24-year-old Robbert van den Broeke on May 6, 2004, between 3:32 a.m. and 4:14 a.m. (42 minutes) in the living room of his Hoeven, Holland home. Photograph © 2004 by Robbert van den Broeke. May 11, 2004 Hoeven, Holland - In the early morning of Thursday, May 6, 2004, 24-year-old Robbert van den Broeke - living at his parents' home in Hoeven, Holland - felt "a very strong mind around me" and the urge to get his Olympus digital camera and wait in front of a living room chair to photograph whatever appeared. He did not put the camera on a tripod. First, Robbert saw a faint mist which he photographed. The mist became denser and over the next 42 minutes, he took four more photographs. By the fifth photograph shown above, the mist had formed into the "alien" figure "sitting" in the living room chair in front of a framed photograph of the 2-year-son of Robbert's oldest sister, Saskya, twenty-seven. Twenty-four hours later at 4 a.m. on Friday, May 7, Robbert took more digital photographs of the alien entity appearing again in the chair. Born May 7, 1980, that day was Robbert's twenty-fourth birthday and he discovered a crop formation in one of the fields near his home which he has shown to Omroep Brabant Nieuwsredactie (radio and television network Brabant) in Holland, but has not yet appeared in the news. Then another twenty-four hours later around 4 a.m. on Saturday, May 8, 2004, Robbert felt agitated and could not sleep. In his bedroom, he set up his 8mm VHS videotape camera (purchased about five years ago) on a tripod and waited. In front of his bedroom door, he could see mist again taking shape and began to videotape. The only people who have so far seen the videotape are Robbert; his 27-year-old sister, Saskya; his 19-year-old sister Madelom; his parents, Nanny and Peter; and radio reporter Bianca Venvught from Omroep Brabant Nieuwsredactie south of Rotterdam. Bianca told me yesterday that the videotape is "incredible." I have talked with both Robbert and his father, Peter van den Broeke, about the photographs and videotape. I asked Peter what his reaction was to seeing his son's videotape? Interview: Peter van den Broeke, (53-years-old) Bank General Manager, Hoeven, Holland: "We are very impressed wow! How is it possible?! Because in the past when all the people tell stories about aliens and that sort of thing - it was not reality for us. But now, my own son (Robbert) in my (living room) chair made pictures and there was a figure that built up from energy. The last picture he took, it was a figure with eyes in it and that was very special. I believe the pictures are real. WHAT DID YOU SEE ON THE VIDEOTAPE THAT ROBBERT TOOK SATURDAY, MAY 8? It is good to know that it is not a digital tape. It is 8mm videotape and he makes the

videotape in his bedroom when it is dark. You see a little bit above the ground, the same figure that is registered on the pictures maybe 50 centimeters tall (about 20 inches). You see only the face and it is still there standing and then after a few moments, it goes to the right. It looks like it moves and then it is gone and in a few moments later, there is more light, (a figure) more taller. My opinion is exactly the same on the (still photo) pictures, that it takes energy from the house, from the environment so it can build up to a normal figure. On the videotape, after a few seconds, it is gone and then it starts again. It starts again with energy that is my opinion and makes the figure stronger and stronger and more bright. DO YOU HAVE ANY INTUITIVE SENSE AT THIS POINT ABOUT WHERE THESE CREATURES ORIGINATE? Not at all. It is very strange. We are normal persons. Ten to fifteen years ago, we did not know anything about all that is possible. But I have no understanding of it. It is so bizarre and all what Robbert felt, feels, sees, in the past and about the future it's always correct. So, we believe 100% what he is telling us. I have no reason to not believe him. We saw even with Nancy Talbott from your country (U.S.A.) light balls in the front of the windows (at our house.) They were changing very fast, moving very fast. When the balls are coming, you feel how do you call that? GOOSEBUMPS? Goosebumps from your toes to your head and we saw it with our own eyes. DO YOU AND YOUR WIFE EVER GET ANY IMPRESSIONS ABOUT WHAT THE LIGHT BALLS ARE? I am not for sure because all of what we think is a message from Robbert. My opinion is they are sort of energy with a mental brain in it. It is possible that the energy takes forms in bright light balls or transparent light balls. We have more than hundreds of pictures with strange figures from energy. Now, it looks like it has built up into figures that we can see and can communicate with in the other dimension. If you are here maybe Robbert told you that you can make connection with the other worlds that are higher. You can take a picture of Robbert and you see Robbert with maybe 100 light balls around his head. (Then), Robbert take a picture of you and around you might be hundreds of light balls. This is a sort of energy. I don't know where from, but it is still there anytime, anywhere that Robbert is, the light balls are there. WHY DO YOU THINK THE LIGHT BALLS ARE MAKING CROP CIRCLES? I don't know. I don't know why. When you listen to the story of Robbert, his opinion is there is a sort of message to the Earth to make the Earth better, to give positive energy to the network of (magnetic ley) lines. But I don't know. WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO WITH THE VIDEOTAPE? I keep it as a very, very nice document and I wrote a book this last year with all the stories from the beginning to now. I thought that the book was on the end, but every day we register very interesting stories. So I need to make another part, another chapter. It is so amazing when I wrote about everything that happened here the past fifteen years. It's a very, very hectic story and is unbelievable. BUT DO YOU THINK YOU WILL GIVE OR LET THE TELEVISION COMPANY THAT IS COMING HAVE A COPY OF THE VIDEOTAPE TO SHOW ON TV? It is a very private document (not to be released yet.)" Robbert van den Broeke, 24-years-old, Self-Described Energy Medium, Hoeven, Holland: "It's very strange when you see light balls for years and I make pictures and you see light balls in the pictures. (His father says he has at least 1,000 photographs of anomalies.) Then I see this creature (in the living room), an alien and it's strange. I can't explain it. THIS WAS A SURPRISE TO YOU THEN TO GET AN ALIEN ON YOUR PHOTO? Yes, it's a big surprise. I was feeling when I'm upstairs (bedroom) in the night a very strong mind around me and it's a feeling that they know exactly who I am. I was feeling very strong and very good. I feel love and I don't have words. I feel it was very high energy and love and peace. I feel the same feeling when I pray and feel God. I was making pictures and I see in my living room a bit of flesh with black eyes and I look on the picture and you see, very strange, the face. And I see (with my own eyes) faces in the living room.

I have many times, every day when I've made contact with the other dimension and talking with God, I feel that there are ghosts around me. I can feel them and I also feel when there is a crop circle coming. I see the area (where the circle will occur) in a vision in my mind. WHEN I WAS TALKING WITH BIANCA VENVUGHT, THE REPORTER FROM THE BREDA RADIO STATION. SHE TOLD ME THAT YOU HAVE A SERIES OF PHOTOS SHOWING THE CHAIR WITH JUST A LITTLE MIST. AND THEN OTHER PHOTOGRAPHS AS THIS ENTITY EMERGES ON THE PHOTOGRAPH. COULD YOU DESCRIBE THE SEQUENCE OF PHOTOGRAPHS FOR ME? Yes, I was making a picture in a the living room and I could see with my eyes, faces. And when I make pictures, you can see that it was a mist and the mist was bigger, bigger and on the first picture you see a little bit mist. Picture two, you see more mist. And by picture four, you see a figure. By picture five, you see a body with black eyes. I have a very strong feeling it's special and has a message for people and for the world. A MESSAGE? I have a feeling that it is, things are going on in the world where people are thinking only about yourself. People thinking about self, living only for self. There is a spiritual evolution and I have a feeling that the world is so much death and you have wars and there are people fighting. It's a big problem. I have the feeling that many people don't believe there is more. But when you see this (photos and videotape), there is more. It's a message from another dimension where it's a reality. And we are not crazy. I say to people, there are gifts, there are mediums. It's a big job. People love you and people hate you. When you come with pictures. May 8, 2004 Videotape of Entity There is now this new thing. I have the videotape in my sleep room when I feel there was creatures I had a feeling that the other dimension it sounds strange when I say I had the feeling there was a UFO and I know that they are there. I don't know. Maybe it's from another dimension, maybe from other planets. I don't know. I was sitting and meditating and asked, 'OK, I'm here. Is there something? Can you do something?' There was a video camera and I was looking in the video camera and I was seeing in front of the door and it's true a face from an alien and he was moving and you could see as if he was walking. It's strange, so strange. And I can see it in the camera. It was like it was transparent. ROBBERT, IS THE BEING ON THE VIDEOTAPE FROM SATURDAY THE SAME AS THE BEING ON THE CHAIR IN THE PHOTOGRAPHS? Exactly. Exact same faces. It's strange. WHAT DO YOU THINK THE CONNECTION IS BETWEEN THE LIGHT BALLS AND THESE BEINGS YOU ARE PHOTOGRAPHING? Yes, that is a good question. I have a feeling it is the same energy. I have also felt very strong dead people many times. It's another world and I feel it. This energy is another energy and it's special when you can film it and when you can make pictures. And the crop circles are a high level and UFOs are light bodies and aliens are sending from a higher dimension and they have a mission. They are not here to make people scared. They are not the boogeyman. They are good. Maybe around God there are many angels. Around God, maybe aliens are sort of planetary operation to send energy of special places, all power places. They look sometimes for people to have contact person that they can talk with as a medium. I'm a medium and maybe they were talking with me. I don't know. It's a very new experience for me and at this moment, a little bit difficult. Are Some Light Balls Angels From On High? ROBBERT, DO YOU THINK THAT THE LIGHT BALLS ARE DIFFERENT ENERGIES THAN THE CREATURES? When you are talking about the light balls that make crop circles I have a feeling that they

are also creatures. The light balls that create crop circles, I have seen crop circles forming. I have had a vision that I must go to places and was biking to places when I have seen them, light balls making circles with my own eyes! I have a feeling that maybe there are aliens or UFOs or angels - I don't know what to call it. It's a big mystery. But they make crop circles. WHAT IS AN ANGEL TO YOU? An angel is very high. When you see an angel people have seen angels - and make your life deeper. When you have a strong feeling that you have problems and in one second, you are thinking something else sometimes that is from angels. Angels are more around God they are very high. They are very creative. They send creative energy. They are creating many things. The light balls in the pictures are sometimes angels and sometimes people (souls). When you are psychic or a medium I am a medium I can feel it sometimes when I see pictures what it is. And you have people in America, also in Holland, people (who are sensitive). And the creatures I have a feeling that it's another energy, another world. It has a contract with the angels and with God. WHEN THE CREATURE FORMED IN THE CHAIR AND WHEN THE CREATURE CAME ON YOUR VIDEOTAPE, DID YOU GET ANY TELEPATHIC THOUGHTS IN YOUR MIND? That's a good question. I was feeling a very big mind. And when they are looking to me, I can feel it. I can feel there was something ZZZZZZ, ZZZZZZ (Robbert makes a buzzing sound). A noise. Then I have a feeling I must go out and talk about this seriously that it is really another reality. But I have not talked with the creatures. At this moment, I don't feel telepathic contact. But maybe when I'm meditating another time, there will come information and I can talk with them about this (your question). Mysterious Lights and Crop Circles LET ME ASK YOU ANOTHER QUESTION ABOUT THE LIGHT BALLS ASSOCIATED WITH MAKING THE CROP FORMATIONS THAT YOU HAVE SEEN WITH YOUR OWN EYES. WHY DO YOU THINK THE LIGHT BALLS HAVE BEEN MAKING THESE PATTERNS IN THE FIELDS FOR SO MANY YEARS? It's so big mystery. It's the big secret from the other dimension. I have a feeling that when people see this that they feel love, feel peace, they see in the patterns harmony. Sometimes you see symbol.s and when you walk into the circle, you can feel energy and it makes the people see more their insides, more emotional and more spiritual and they are coming more behind the mystery inside the people who experience it. People know at that moment that there is more. I have a feeling that the crop circles it's a signal from another dimension from above people. 'Look out your mother Earth is crying. See that? You can see the tears.' I think they are not coming so much to teach people things, but to give people the feeling that they can live a different way. HOW COULD THE CROP FORMATIONS CHANGE ANYTHING ON THE EARTH? The whole earth has energy lines in it. And the energy lines, you have places you can call it 'chakras of the Earth' and they are doing something. They give an engine with energy and it goes on a network throughout the whole world. Sometimes when you are standing in places, you can feel it. If you are very sensitive, you can feel it. More and the crop circles help people know there is more. It's very good. I don't know exactly how it works. It's so high, such big worlds. It's a secret from God and I cannot explain it. But I have a feeling that I must tell something, that I must do something with my gifts. The Future? HAVE YOU EVER RECEIVED FROM THE LIGHT BALLS ANY PICTURES IN YOUR MIND OF WHAT COULD HAPPEN IN THE FUTURE ON THIS PLANET BETWEEN NOW IN 2004 AND SAY, 2012? I know that in all the New Age information, there are many people who talk about 2012 and I don't know it. I have no special information about 2012. I feel that we are living in a special time and there are more children being born with special gifts. Maybe there is something in the collective mind from people that will change something in the time line.

I can only say that here in Hoeven, there are strange things. And that in America, there are strange things. You have many skeptical people. I, myself, am very skeptical. I know that there ARE other dimensions and am very happy and I thank God. I hope he blesses me and is helping me and that people believe me and not thinking that I am crazy or a liar. What has happened is true and I am very happy I have the pictures and videotape of the alien standing in the tape. ROBBERT, DO YOU THINK THE ENTITY ON THE PHOTOGRAPHS AND THE VIDEOTAPE WILL KEEP COMING TO YOU IN YOUR HOUSE IN HOEVEN TO BE PHOTOGRAPHED AND VIDEOTAPED? That the creature is enthusiastic for the photographs? It sounds very strange, but I have a feeling that it is, yes. WILL YOU KEEP A VIDEO CAMERA AND YOUR DIGITAL PHOTO CAMERA WAITING FOR THE FEELING OF THAT OTHER MIND SO YOU CAN KEEP VIDEOTAPING AND PHOTOGRAPHING? Yes, from out of respect, I do it. When I have a feeling, I do it and am waiting and when they will contact, then I can tape it. I have a feeling that they are coming more times and that I can tape it. I also have a feeling that there is coming a time when there is maybe people with a camera behind me, of maybe serious media, that they can film this themselves around me. I see it in some vision that is possible. It is the shock in the world that is good. WHY WOULD THE CREATURE BE COMING NOW TO BE PHOTOGRAPHED AND VIDEOTAPED, DO YOU THINK? I have a feeling that it wants to prove to people that it is true. That there are no jokes. People are talking about having a meeting with an alien. Some people, I believe, have really seen an alien. I have seen really an alien. I have a feeling that they have a message for us to be good to each other. It's simple message, but when you are living with God, when you believe in God, you believe in angels, you believe maybe in UFOs, it's easier. It's healing your pain. You have a feeling that you are strong. You feel a big mind around you. Life is very hard and there is a reason for why life is very big and difficult. We must feel pain sometimes to grow up to a spiritual level. We must have pain sometimes. For really spiritual people in the beginning, it's very difficult. You almost die. In yourself, you must die. And when you have this experience, you are stronger. Your mind is growing up, growing up."
